brownies

Class Tent

  • java.lang.Object
    • brownies.Tent

  • public class Tent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will create tent objects that have a known capacity i.e the number of brownies they can accommodate and a number as a label. The tents also will have an array of brownie objects. The size of the array depends on the tents capacity.
    Author:
    Alex Peden
